fields.name: psycopg2
fields.description: Psycopg is the most popular PostgreSQL adapter for the Python programming language. At its core it fully implements the Python DB API 2.0 specifications. Several extensions allow access to many of the features offered by PostgreSQL.

fields.name: mysql-python
fields.description: MySQL support for Python. MySQL versions 3.23-5.1; and Python versions 2.3-2.6 are supported. MySQLdb is the Python DB API-2.0 interface. _mysql is a low-level API similiar to the MySQL C API. ZMySQLDA is a Database Adapter for Zope2.

fields.name: fabric
fields.description: Simple, Pythonic remote execution and deployment. Please file tickets at http://code.fabfile.org instead of sending pull requests!

fields.name: gunicorn
fields.description: gunicorn 'Green Unicorn' is a WSGI HTTP Server for UNIX, fast clients and sleepy applications.

fields.name: django-haystack
fields.description: Modular search for Django.  Currently v1.2.4.

fields.name: django-voting
fields.description: A generic voting application for Django projects.

fields.name: django-notification
fields.description: User notification management for the Django web framework.

fields.name: django-sphinx
fields.description: A transparent layer for full-text search using Sphinx and Django.

fields.name: django-debug-toolbar
fields.description: A configurable set of panels that display various debug information about the current request/response.

fields.name: django-annoying
fields.description: This is django application that try to eliminate annoying things in Django framework.

fields.name: django-extensions
fields.description: This is a repository for collecting global custom management extensions for the Django Framework.

fields.name: django-imagekit
fields.description: Automates image processing for Django models. Resize, process and cache multiple versions of your image files. Access newly created files with a standard API. Supports alternate storage schemes such as Amazon S3.

fields.name: django-avatar
fields.description: A reusable django application for handling Avatars.

fields.name: south
fields.description: South is a tool to provide consistent, easy-to-use and database-agnostic migrations for Django applications.
